name: OCKDailyPageViewController
desc: A view controller that displays a calendar in the header, and a page view controller in the body.

items.name: init(storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager, adherenceAggregator: OCKAdherenceAggregator)
items.desc: Creates a view controller that contains a synchronized calendar with a tasks collection.

items.name: let storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager
items.desc: The object that provides synchronization between the store and view controller.

items.name: func dailyPageViewController(OCKDailyPageViewController, didFailWithError: Error)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when your app encounters an unhandled error in a daily page view controller.

items.name: func dailyPageViewController(OCKDailyPageViewController, prepare: OCKListViewController, for: Date)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that the view controller that displays daily tasks is about to be presented.

items.name: func pageViewController(UIPageViewController, viewControllerBefore: UIViewController) -> UIViewController?
items.desc: Returns a view controller for the date previous to the currently selected date.

items.name: func pageViewController(UIPageViewController, viewControllerAfter: UIViewController) -> UIViewController?
items.desc: Returns a view controller for the date after the currently selected date.

items.name: func pageViewController(UIPageViewController, didFinishAnimating: Bool, previousViewControllers: [UIViewController], transitionCompleted: Bool)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when a gesture-initiated transition ends in the page view controller.

items.name: func weekCalendarPageViewController(OCKWeekCalendarPageViewController, didChangeDateInterval: DateInterval)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate of a change in the calendar's date interval.

items.name: func weekCalendarPageViewController(OCKWeekCalendarPageViewController, didEncounterError: Error)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when your app encounters an unhandled error in a week calendar page view controller.

items.name: func weekCalendarPageViewController(OCKWeekCalendarPageViewController, didSelectDate: Date, previousDate: Date)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate of a change in the selected date.
